test.name: Verify That User Can Sign Up Success With Category Individual

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Go To
kw.doc: Navigates the current browser window to the provided ``url``.

kw.name: Set Screenshot Directory
kw.doc: Sets the directory for captured screenshots.

kw.name: Given User open app to sign up screen
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: When User input success full all info
Name
kw.doc: :example 'John Doe'

kw.name: Generate Random String
kw.doc: Generates a string with a desired ``length`` from the given ``chars``.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Set Variable
kw.doc: Returns the given values which can then be assigned to a variables.

kw.name: Create List
kw.doc: Returns a list containing given items.

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Set Suite Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available everywhere within the scope of the current suite.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text 'Melanie Jenkins' into text field 'xpath://*[contains(@data-test-id,'signupName')]//input'.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element

kw.name: Get Field
Connect To Mongodb
kw.doc: Loads pymongo and connects to the MongoDB host using parameters submitted.

kw.name: Retrieve Mongodb Records With Desired Fields
kw.doc: Retrieves from a document(s) the desired projection. In a sql terms: select a and b from table; For more details about querying records from Mongodb and comparison to sql see the [http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/sql-comparison|Mongodb] documentation.
kw.msg: @{allResults} = [ {'_id': ObjectId('5eb0eae78c34723f2f6ffd52'), 'name': {'en': 'Document shipping', 'vi': 'Giao chứng từ, giấy tờ'}} ]

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.
kw.msg: [{'_id': ObjectId('5eb0eae78c34723f2f6ffd52'), 'name': {'en': 'Document shipping', 'vi': 'Giao chứng từ, giấy tờ'}}]

kw.name: Set To Dictionary
kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.
kw.msg: &{dict} = { _id=5eb0eae78c34723f2f6ffd52 | name={'en': 'Document shipping', 'vi': 'Giao chứng từ, giấy tờ'} }

kw.name: Disconnect From Mongodb
kw.doc: Disconnects from the MongoDB server.

kw.msg: ${user_type} = {'_id': ObjectId('5eb0eae78c34723f2f6ffd52'), 'name': {'en': 'Document shipping', 'vi': 'Giao chứng từ, giấy tờ'}}

kw.name: Log
kw.doc: Logs the given message with the given level.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking element 'xpath://*[@class='category-item']//*[contains(text(),'Giao chứng từ, giấy tờ')]'.

kw.name: Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Click Element
kw.doc: Click the element identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: And User click to Sign Up button
Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Clicking button 'xpath://*[@class='mt-4 submit-signup v-btn v-btn--block v-btn--large v-btn--depressed theme--light accent']'.

kw.name: And Go to input activation code screen and input code success
Wait Until Element Is Visible
kw.doc: Waits until the element ``locator`` is visible.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '2' into text field 'xpath://*[@class='digits my-4']/input[1]'.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.

kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '0' into text field 'xpath://*[@class='digits my-4']/input[3]'.

kw.name: Input Text
kw.doc: Types the given ``text`` into the text field identified by ``locator``.
kw.msg: Typing text '7' into text field 'xpath://*[@class='digits my-4']/input[4]'.

kw.name: Then User sign up success to new order screen
Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element 'xpath://*[@class='new-order__form__title']' contains exact text 'Đơn hàng mới'.

kw.name: Get User Info When Sign Up
Get Records
Connect To Mongodb
kw.doc: Loads pymongo and connects to the MongoDB host using parameters submitted.

kw.name: Retrieve Some Mongodb Records
kw.doc: Retrieve some of the records from a given MongoDB database collection based on the JSON entered. Returned value must be single quoted for comparison, otherwise you will get a TypeError error.

kw.doc: Adds the given ``key_value_pairs`` and ``items`` to the ``dictionary``.

kw.doc: Retrieves from a document(s) the desired projection. In a sql terms: select a and b from table; For more details about querying records from Mongodb and comparison to sql see the [http://docs.mongodb.org/manual/reference/sql-comparison|Mongodb] documentation.
